tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE emergency_response_center_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_response_centers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    center_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_supplies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    expiration_date DATE,
    center_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES emergency_response_centers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    condition VARCHAR(50),
    center_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES emergency_response_centers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE supply_requests (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    request_date DATE,
    supply_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    center_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (supply_id) REFERENCES medical_supplies(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES emergency_response_centers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_centers_inventory (
    center_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    center_name STRING,
    location STRING,
    contact_person STRING
)
